Name: maximize_velocity
Description: Average story points completed per sprint

Name: maximize_team_stability
Description: Keep consistent team composition over time

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failures
Description: Reduce number of sprints missing their goal

Name: maximize_requirement_clarity
Description: Improve quality of user stories by reducing ambiguity

Name: minimize_effort_deviation
Description: Reduce difference between estimated and actual task effort

Name: minimize_technical_debt
Description: Reduce tasks marked as technical debt

Name: maximize_documentation_coverage
Description: Ensure all features have linked documentation

Name: minimize_sprint_duration_waste
Description: Optimize time spent in non-productive sprint activities
